title: How to Take a Screenshot on a Nokia Android Phone

steps.title: Taking a screenshot captures everything on the screen.
steps.content: Taking a screenshot captures everything on the screen. You can screenshot any app or website. For example, if you want to take a screenshot of a web page, open your browser and go to the preferred web page.

steps.title: Pressing these two buttons together captures a screenshot.
steps.content: Pressing these two buttons together captures a screenshot. You can find those buttons on the right side of your phone. You will hear camera shutter sounds that indicate your screenshot has been successfully taken.

steps.title: You can easily share or delete the screenshot from the notification panel.
steps.content: You can easily share or delete the screenshot from the notification panel. You can also see your screenshots in the Google Photos and "Downloads" app.
